results.vision_yaml:
product_name: Partner Enablement Workspace
product_summary: A platform that enables university extension programs to enhance
  personalized engagement through workflow automation, shared dashboards, and open
  APIs.
target_users:
- Corporate operations managers overseeing university extension programs
- Program managers responsible for personalized engagement strategies
value_proposition:
- Automate notifications for KPI deviations to improve operational efficiency
- Offer guided playbooks for personalized engagement with context-specific checklists
- Simulate scenarios in sandbox environments before full deployment
- Customize workflows based on business unit needs
key_capabilities:
- Real-time notifications via Slack/Teams for KPI deviations
- Guided playbooks with contextual checklists for personalized engagement
- Sandbox environments for testing personalized engagement scenarios
- Customizable workflows per business unit
non_goals:
- Full-featured general CRM or marketing automation tools
- Deep integration with third-party CRMs or marketing platforms
success_metrics:
- Reduce manual intervention in KPI monitoring by 50% within six months
- Increase successful deployment of personalized engagement scenarios by 20% per quarter
last_updated: 2025-01-01
results.review_yaml:
status: aligned
summary:
- Requirements align well with the vision of enhancing personalized engagement
- No conflicts detected between requested features and stated non-goals
requirements_alignment:
  aligned:
  - FR001 covers real-time notifications for KPI deviations
  - FR002 maps to guided playbooks with contextual checklists
  - FR003 addresses sandbox environments for testing scenarios
  - FR004 supports customizable workflows per business unit
  gaps:
  - Missing explicit success metrics or telemetry requirements
  - No mention of user interface design considerations
  conflicts: []
recommended_actions:
- Define acceptance criteria for notification accuracy and latency
- Include user interface design requirements for accessibility and usability
- Specify detailed success metrics for key performance indicators
narrative: The scope is coherent with the partner enablement workspace vision; additional
  details on success metrics and user interface design are needed before implementation.
results.raw_response:

results.vision_yaml:
product_name: Talent Onboarding Console
product_summary: A comprehensive platform for public sector teams in APAC to manage
  talent onboarding, focusing on compliance tracking, analytics, and role-based automation.
target_users:
- HR managers overseeing onboarding processes
- Compliance officers ensuring regulatory adherence
- Operations teams managing large-scale onboarding events
value_proposition:
- Streamlines onboarding compliance with real-time guidance
- Provides actionable insights through advanced analytics
- Facilitates efficient team collaboration through role-based workspaces
key_capabilities:
- Real-time compliance tracking with contextual guidance
- Advanced analytics on onboarding trends and anomalies
- Role-based workspaces for seamless team collaboration
non_goals:
- Full-featured personalization for individual user preferences
- Customizable dashboards for each user role
success_metrics:
- Reduce compliance errors by 50% within six months
- Increase onboarding completion rates by 20% per quarter
- Achieve 99.9% uptime during business hours
last_updated: 2025-01-01
results.review_yaml:
status: aligned
summary:
- Requirements align well with the vision of a comprehensive onboarding management
  tool
- No conflicts detected between requested features and stated non-goals
requirements_alignment:
  aligned:
  - FR001 covers real-time compliance tracking with guidance
  - FR002 maps to advanced analytics on onboarding trends and anomalies
  - FR003 integrates with Slack for data synchronization
  - FR004 offers role-based workspaces for team collaboration
  gaps:
  - Missing explicit success metrics or telemetry requirements
  - No mention of data residency constraints in functional requirements
  conflicts: []
recommended_actions:
- Add acceptance criteria for compliance guidance accuracy and response times
- Include data residency requirements in non-functional constraints
- Define success metrics for onboarding completion rates and error reduction
narrative: The scope is coherent with the talent onboarding console vision; additional
  details on success metrics and data residency are needed before implementation.
results.raw_response:

results.vision_yaml:
product_name: Brand Sentiment Radar
product_summary: A tool for startups to monitor brand sentiment across social media
  platforms, providing real-time analytics and insights for informed decision-making.
target_users:
- Marketing teams analyzing brand reputation
- Customer service representatives responding to public feedback
value_proposition:
- Real-time monitoring of brand sentiment across multiple channels
- Automated detection of trends and anomalies in customer feedback
- Insights-driven recommendations for improving brand perception
key_capabilities:
- Social media listening with customizable filters
- Automated sentiment analysis and trend visualization
- Actionable insights for marketing and customer service teams
non_goals:
- Full-text search capabilities for historical data
- Integration with external CRM systems
success_metrics:
- Increase in positive brand sentiment by 20% within six months
- Reduction in response time for customer service inquiries by 30%
last_updated: 2025-01-01
results.review_yaml:
status: gaps
summary:
- Requirements do not align with the vision's focus on real-time monitoring and insights
- Some functional requirements are not directly related to the core purpose
requirements_alignment:
  aligned:
  - FR001 partially aligns with the vision but focuses on inventory management
  - FR002 partially aligns with the vision but focuses on campaign analytics
  gaps:
  - Missing requirements for real-time monitoring and sentiment analysis
  - No requirements for action items or insights generation
  conflicts: []
recommended_actions:
- Add FR for real-time sentiment analysis and trend detection
- Include FR for generating actionable insights from sentiment data
- Remove FR001 and FR002 as they do not align with the core purpose
narrative: The current requirements do not fully support the vision of a tool for
  real-time monitoring and insights. Additional requirements need to be defined to
  ensure alignment.
results.raw_response:

  - FR002 partially aligns with the vision but focuses on campaign analytics
  gaps:

  - No requirements for action items or insights generation
  conflicts: []
recommended_actions:

- Remove FR001 and FR002 as they do not align with the core purpose

results.vision_yaml:
product_name: Incident Automation Studio
product_summary: An automation platform for manufacturing supply chains in EMEA, enabling
  process automation through workflow orchestration, real-time dashboards, and secure
  API integrations.
target_users:
- Supply chain managers automating processes
- IT teams implementing secure integrations
value_proposition:
- Automate complex supply chain processes with minimal manual intervention
- Provide real-time visibility into process statuses via shared dashboards
- Ensure secure and compliant data exchange through robust API integrations
key_capabilities:
- Workflow automation with customizable business unit-specific processes
- Real-time dashboards for monitoring process transitions
- Secure API integrations with TLS 1.3 and AES-256 encryption
non_goals:
- Full process management or end-to-end supply chain optimization
- Advanced machine learning or AI-driven process improvements
success_metrics:
- Reduce manual intervention in supply chain processes by 50% within six months
- Achieve 99.9% uptime across all regions
- Ensure average API response time under 300ms at P95
last_updated: 2025-01-01
results.review_yaml:
status: aligned
summary:
- Functional requirements align with the vision's emphasis on process automation and
  secure integrations
- Non-functional requirements match the high standards for security and performance
requirements_alignment:
  aligned:
  - FR001 matches the need for secure API integrations
  - FR002 supports real-time visibility into process transitions
  - FR003 aligns with customizable business unit-specific processes
  - FR004 fits the need for sandbox environments to test integrations
  gaps: []
  conflicts: []
recommended_actions:
- Ensure acceptance criteria for API response time and encryption standards are defined
- Define clear guidelines for OAuth2 provider integrations
- Establish a budget tracking mechanism to monitor spending against the cap
narrative: The incident automation studio aligns well with the vision and requirements;
  minor clarifications on acceptance criteria and budget tracking are needed before
  implementation.
results.raw_response:

  providing real-time analytics and automated insights for informed decision-making.

- Operations managers overseeing logistics and supply chain
value_proposition:
- Real-time analytics on brand sentiment and operational data
- Automated insights for quicker decision-making

results.vision_yaml:
product_name: Customer Signals Hub
product_summary: A platform for manufacturing supply chains in APAC to automate processes,
  monitor performance, and ensure compliance through configurable workflows, anomaly
  detection, and real-time notifications.
target_users:
- Manufacturing supply chain operators
- Compliance officers
- Process automation engineers
value_proposition:
- Automate routine tasks to reduce manual intervention and errors
- Provide real-time insights into process performance via customizable dashboards
- Ensure regulatory compliance with configurable data retention policies
key_capabilities:
- Configure process automation workflows for different business units
- Simulate process automation scenarios in sandbox environments
- Highlight anomalies in process performance on role-based dashboards
- Trigger notifications for KPI deviations via integrated messaging platforms
non_goals:
- Full-featured code development environment
- Advanced machine learning for predictive analytics
success_metrics:
- Increase in process automation efficiency by 30% within six months
- Reduction in manual intervention by 50% within one year
last_updated: 2025-01-01

status: aligned
summary:
- Functional requirements align with the vision of automating processes and monitoring
  performance
- Non-functional requirements address key aspects like compliance and performance
- Constraints are consistent with the budget and technical requirements
requirements_alignment:
  aligned:

  - FR002 supports sandbox environments for testing

- Specify data security standards beyond GDPR and HIPAA
narrative: The requirements are aligned with the vision for the Customer Signals Hub,
  focusing on process automation and performance monitoring. Additional details on
  integration, user support, and data security will enhance the scope before implementation.

- Ensure all functional requirements are aligned with the vision and provide value

  and insights. Additional clarity and alignment are needed to ensure all requirements
  support the intended value proposition.

- Custom trading algorithms development

- Increase operational efficiency by 20% per quarter

results.vision_yaml:
product_name: Skills Graph Navigator
product_summary: A platform for enterprise teams in the US to manage skills inventory,
  analyze campaign performance, and automate workflows with role-based access.
target_users:
- HR managers overseeing workforce development
- Operations leaders focusing on talent management
- Data analysts providing insights into team performance
value_proposition:
- Centralized skill management to optimize workforce allocation
- Real-time analytics for informed decision-making
- Automated workflows to streamline operations
key_capabilities:
- Inventory management with contextual guidance
- Campaign performance analytics with trend visualization
- Role-based workspaces for secure collaboration
non_goals:
- Full-scale human resource management system
- Comprehensive training program design
success_metrics:
- Increase in workforce productivity by 20% within six months
- Reduction in manual data entry by 70%
- Improvement in campaign success rate by 15% per quarter
last_updated: 2025-01-01
results.review_yaml:
status: aligned
summary:
- Requirements align well with the product vision of managing skills and automating
  workflows
- Non-functional requirements and constraints are consistent with the target audience
requirements_alignment:
  aligned:
  - FR001 matches the inventory management capability
  - FR002 corresponds to the analytics feature
  - FR003 aligns with the integration requirement
  - FR004 fits the role-based workspace concept
  gaps:
  - No explicit mention of response times or encryption details in functional requirements
  - Constraints are adequately covered in non-functional requirements
  conflicts: []
recommended_actions:
- Ensure FR001 includes specific guidelines for contextual guidance
- Confirm that FR002 includes detailed metrics for trend and anomaly detection
- Verify that NFR003 specifies the exact encryption and TLS versions
- Clarify the budget cap in C002 for clarity
narrative: The requirements are aligned with the Skills Graph Navigator vision and
  meet the needs of the target users. Minor clarifications are needed for response
  times, encryption details, and budget cap for implementation.
results.raw_response:
